spotoroo: spatiotemporal clustering in R of hot spot

Source: R/hotspot_cluster.R
spotoroo.Rd

A package for clustering satellite hot spots and detecting fire ignition points.

Authors

  • Weihao Li weihao.li@monash.edu

  • Dianne Cook dicook@monash.edu

  • Emily Dodwell emdodwell@gmail.com

Functions

The spotoroo package provides 13 important functions:

  • hotspot_cluster()

  • global_clustering()

  • local_clustering()

  • handle_noise()

  • ignition_point()

  • get_fire_mov()

  • plot.spotoroo()

  • plot_spotoroo()

  • plot_def()

  • plot_fire_mov()

  • plot_timeline()

  • transform_time_id()

  • dist_point_to_vector()

The spotoroo package provides 2 external data objects:

  • hotspots

  • vic_map
